scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=2]%///[call_id] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;appearance-index=1 CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=ptime:50

ACK sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=2]%///[call_id] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;appearance-index=1 CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=2]%///[call_id] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;appearance-index=1 CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 [field1 file="caller.csv" line=2] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=ptime:50

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=2]%///[call_id] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;appearance-index=1 [routes] CSeq: 2 ACK Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Record-Route:] [last_Route:] Accept: application/sdp, application/isup, application/dtmf, application/dtmf-relay, multipart/mixed Allow: INVITE,ACK,CANCEL,BYE,REGISTER,REFER,INFO,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,UPDATE,OPTIONS,MESSAGE,PUBLISH Require: timer Supported: timer,replaces Session-Expires: 1800;refresher=uac Content-Disposition: session; handling=required Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=ptime:50

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=2]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=2]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=2]%///[call_id] Call-Info: <sip:[field2 file="caller.csv" line=2]>;appearance-index=1 CSeq: 3 BYE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=2]@[local_ip]:[local_port] [routes] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
